profile: Passionate software engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expert in JavaScript ecosystems with a focus on React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Known for delivering high-quality solutions while mentoring junior developers and contributing to open source projects.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Led the frontend architecture for a SaaS product serving 100k+ users. Implemented design system and improved performance by 40%.
achievements: Reduced bundle size by 35% through code splitting and lazy loading
Implemented testing framework reducing bugs by 60%

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained full-stack applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Worked in an agile environment with cross-functional teams.
achievements: Built 5 major features that increased user engagement by 25%
Set up CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 70%
Collaborated with UX team to improve user experience

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed enterprise applications using Java and Angular. Worked on legacy system modernization projects.
achievements: Participated in code reviews and documentation

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Created responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Worked primarily with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.
achievements: Optimized websites for performance and SEO

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: Developed web applications using React and Node.js. Started as an intern and was promoted to full-time.
achievements: Assisted in bug fixes and maintenance
